descriptions.ENA: Large Reference Taxonomy of almost a million taxa.
descriptions.GermanSL: German Standard List for Plants. Example taxonomy of 13,000 taxa (and many more synonyms)
descriptions.VASCAN: Vascular Plants of Canada. 10,000 taxa (and more synonyms)
descriptions.MT Specimens: 140,000 specimens of plants collected mainly in Canada. Location and time data.
descriptions.HIBG Specimens: Harriet Irving Botanic Garden collection of roughly 10,000 specimens.

demo.loadButtonTooltip: Use this button to select and load a DWCA archive from your computer

visHelpTips.ImplicitTaxonomy: A view of a taxonomy produced by mapping parent ID fields to taxon IDs in the same dataset.
visHelpTips.ExplicitTaxonomy: A view of a taxonomy based on explicit kingdom/order/family/genus etc fields in a DWCA dataset.
visHelpTips.DWCAMapLeaflet: A leaflet.js based map that clusters and plots available longitude and latitude data.
visHelpTips.TimeLine: This view shows a zoomable bar chart that aggregates the dates on which specimens were collected.
visHelpTips.Sanity: This view produces a number of tables detailing the amount of missing data per field over the record set.
visHelpTips.RecordDetails: This launches a small view with a text input box. Type in a DWCA ID for the dataset under view to see details of that record.
visHelpTips.ImpTaxaDistribution: A zoomable bar chart that shows the distribution of the number of immediate sub-taxa of each taxon. Large, outlying numbers of immediate child taxa can be a quality concern.
visHelpTips.expTaxaDistribution: A zoomable bar chart that shows the distribution of the number of immediate sub-taxa of each taxon. Large, outlying numbers of immediate child taxa can be a quality concern.
visHelpTips.FilterView: A small view with a text input that allows the names/labels of the current record set to be searched and selected for matches (inc. partial matches).

launcher.noFileWriter: This Browser does not support the HTML5 FileWriter API

helpTips.selectSave: Save the DWCA IDs of the currently selected records to a web page. Here they can be cut'n'pasted to other applications.
helpTips.selectInvert: Invert the current selection. Repeating this will restore the original selection.
helpTips.selectClear: Clear the current selection. Not reversible.
compareLabel: Compare the names in this taxonomy against those in another dataset. Clicking this button will turn it yellow.
Clicking the equivalent button in another dataset's Controls view will then calculate the similarity between the two datasets' name sets.
The matching names will be selected and highlighted accordingly.

barChart.rangeSliderBarText:
Change current range by dragging with left click
Select current range with right click

parser.missingCoreError: JQuery cannot find element[attribute]: core[rowType] within meta.xml.
parser.missingFilesError: JQuery cannot find path [files location] within __part__ section of meta.xml.
parser.missingPathError: JQuery cannot find path [__path__] within meta.xml.
parser.deadonymError: Deadonym. No link to accepted name id __aid__ for __rec__

visSanHeaders.tableCaption: Count of Records missing necessary fields per visualisation type

fieldSanHeaders.tableCaption: Count of Records missing data per field type
